about_me.intro: I'm Razali Ayoub, a dedicated Full-Stack Developer with experience in building modern web applications using Angular and Spring Boot. I’m passionate about clean code, UI/UX, and solving real-world problems through technology. I also enjoy learning new frameworks and working in fast-paced, startup-style environments.

degrees.master: Master's in Computer Science and Network

descriptions.bachelor: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the University of Blida, focusing on programming fundamentals, data structures, databases, and operating systems.
descriptions.master: Master's degree in Computer Science and Network from the University of Blida, specialized in networking, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and final projects oriented toward SaaS solutions.

descriptions.universityTeacher: Taught academic courses and assisted students with practical and theoretical understanding.
descriptions.armyOfficer: Served in the military, responsible for discipline, coordination, and operations as part of national service.
descriptions.analystDeveloper: Developed and maintained software components, contributed to solution design and debugging.
descriptions.juniorIntegrator: Worked on software integration and development tasks for port management systems.
descriptions.softwareEngineer: Designing and implementing software solutions for geophysical operations and internal systems.
